titleStmt.title: The synagogue, or, The shadow of the temple sacred poems and private ejaculations, in imitation of Mr. George Herbert.
titleStmt.author: Harvey, Christopher, 1597-1663.

editionStmt.edition: The seventh edition, corrected and enlarged.
